rules: Rule1: If the oven is connected to Wi-Fi, then provided that internet is not available in the kitchen, safety mode is enabled for the oven.
Rule2: Either the oven is connected to Wi-Fi or the oven is synchronizing with a server.
Rule3: Provided that the oven is synchronizing with a server, the oven performs a cloud backup.
Rule4: In the event that the oven is performing a cloud backup, data is uploaded from the oven.
Rule5: If a manual backup is performed for the oven, then local storage is active for the oven.

Rule6: Provided that a mobile device is connected to the oven, if it is not the case that data being uploaded implies that lack of internet leads to safety mode, then a manual backup is performed for the oven.
Rule7: A mobile device is connected to the oven or a tablet is connected to the oven.
Rule8: If a tablet is connected to the oven, then whenever it is false that data upload implies no internet causes safety mode, a manual backup occurs for the oven.
Rule9: Under the condition that the kitchen game is running, internet is available in the kitchen.
Rule10: Provided that the oven temperature is within the acceptable range, the oven has power turned on.
Rule11: The Europe region is enabled or the USA region is enabled.
Rule12: If the USA region is enabled, then video is being streamed from the kitchen game or the kitchen game is running.
Rule13: In the event that a VPN is active for the kitchen game, if it is not the case that Europe region enabled implies video streaming or game running, then the kitchen game is geo-blocked.
Rule14: A VPN is active for the kitchen game or a proxy is enabled for the kitchen game.
Rule15: The phone is offline or internet is available in the kitchen.
Rule16: If the phone has low battery, then the phone is not offline.
Rule17: Whenever the phone is charging, the phone is not offline.
Rule18: Provided that a cable is connected to the phone, the phone has low battery.
Rule19: A cable is connected to the phone or the phone is wirelessly charging.
Rule20: If the wall outlet is the power source, then whenever the phone is wirelessly charging, the phone is charging.
Rule21: The wall outlet is the power source or a power bank is the power source.
Rule22: Provided that a power bank is the power source, if the phone is wirelessly charging, then the phone is charging.
Rule23: The speaker is muted or internet is available in the kitchen.
Rule24: Under the condition that a temperature alert is active for the oven, a cooking error has not occurred in the oven.
Rule25: If a timer is set for the oven, then provided that the oven has power turned on, if internet is not available in the kitchen, the oven is not actively cooking.
Rule26: Whenever a power failure has affected the oven, a cooking error has not occurred in the oven.
Rule27: If there is a device conflict between the oven and the speaker, then the oven does not have priority in the kitchen.
Rule28: There is a device conflict between the oven and the speaker or a temperature alert is active for the oven or a power failure has affected the oven.
Rule29: In the event that there is a schedule conflict in the kitchen, the time has been adjusted in the kitchen.
Rule30: There is a schedule conflict in the kitchen or the speaker does not have priority for audio.
Rule31: If a diagnostic run is being performed on the oven, then provided that it is not the case that power on implies no internet leads to not cooking active, the oven undergoes a system reset.
Rule32: A diagnostic run is being performed on the oven or the oven is in maintenance mode.
Rule33: Provided that the oven is in maintenance mode, if it is false that power on leads to no internet causing not cooking active, then the oven undergoes a system reset.
Rule34: Under the condition that the oven is in standby mode, if internet is not available in the kitchen, the oven is not actively cooking.
Rule35: If a recipe is selected for the oven, then whenever the oven has power turned on, provided that internet is not available in the kitchen, the oven is not actively cooking.
Rule36: In the event that auto-shutdown is active for the oven, then provided that the oven has power turned on, the oven is in standby mode.
Rule37: Auto-shutdown is active for the oven or energy saver mode is enabled for the oven.
Rule38: Provided that energy saver mode is enabled for the oven, if the oven has power turned on, the oven is in standby mode.
Rule39: If override is active for the oven, then manual control is active for the oven.
Rule40: Whenever soup is ready to serve, a timer is set for the oven.
Rule41: Under the condition that pizza is fully prepared, a recipe is selected for the oven.
Rule42: In the event that it is not the case that temperature okay implies no internet leads to not cooking active, a cooking error occurs in the oven.
Rule43: Provided that it is not the case that Europe region enabled leads to video streaming or game running, the kitchen game is not geo-blocked.
Rule44: Whenever it is not the case that proxy enabled implies that lack of Europe region implication leads to geo-blocked, the connection is secure for the kitchen game.
Rule45: If it is false that proxy enabled implies that no Europe region implication causes geo-blocked, then the connection is not secure for the kitchen game.
Rule46: In the event that it is false that audio settings imply that volume control leads to not muted, sound is disabled for the speaker.
Rule47: If it is not the case that device conflict implies oven priority, then the speaker has priority for audio.
Rule48: Provided that it is false that soup is ready or pizza is prepared, emergency override is active for the oven.
Rule49: Whenever it is not the case that lack of audio settings implication leads to not sound disabled, audio is enabled for the speaker.
Rule50: If it is false that no audio settings implication causes not sound disabled, then audio is not enabled for the speaker.
Rule51: Provided that it is false that lack of internet implies not cooking active, override is active for the oven.
Rule52: In the event that it is not the case that no internet leads to not cooking active, manual control is not active for the oven.
Rule53: If internet is not available in the kitchen, then the oven is actively cooking.
facts: Fact1: The oven temperature is within the acceptable range.
Fact2: Volume control is available for the speaker.
Fact3: Audio settings are configured for the speaker.
Fact4: Local storage is not active for the oven.
Fact5: Video is not being streamed from the kitchen game.
Fact6: The time has not been adjusted in the kitchen.
Fact7: The oven has not undergone a system reset.
Fact8: Emergency override is not active for the oven.
Fact9: Safety mode is not enabled for the oven.

question: Internet is available in the kitchen.
